//title Sign Up Sign In Sign In Retrieve Password
//hint Enter Password Mobile Number Old Password New Password Confirm Password
//OTP Retrieve OTP PIN input field Sit back & Relax! while we verify your mobile number (Enter the OTP below in case if we fail to detect the SMS automatically) Resend OTP
//password Change Password Forget Password Retrieve Password
//error message Enter valid mobile number Enter Full Name Enter vehicle no Enter valid old password Enter valid password Password must be minimum of 4 characters Enter valid pin Find Nearest Enter valid new password Enter valid confirm password No account yet? Click Here Forget Password? Click Here
//navigation Home Bookings Profile Logout Law Get Discount Give Rating/Review Follow Us Privacy Policy Share Your Booked Notification My Account Parking Parking Spot Learn Laws Open Close
//registration Car Number NID Number Occupation (Optional) Sign Out Create Account Already a member? Click here Submit Full Name Vehicle Registration Number Vehicle No: User Phone No
//parking slot Parking Slots Parking Area Name Address No nearest parking area found
//common Please Connect to Internet Please Connect to GPS/Internet Close App Connection Failed OK Retry 70 Subject to availability Get Direction Welcome, LOCC Smart Parking Please Press here to exit! Press OK to exit! %1$s Arrival 04.30pm - 12.30pm Departure Confirm Booking Unavailable Parking Spot You cannot reserve this spot for booking, as there is no parking slot
We do not allow booking to the parking spot until you reach the parking spot
//bottom sheet Choose a spot or swipe up for more Nearest Parking From Your Destination

Search… Please connect to internet and try again Connect to GPS Please enable GPS and turn on Internet to use Parking App Try Again. Please Upload Profile Photo Thanks for being with us Parking Spot has Reserved Successfully Mobile Number doesn\'t exists Time Once reach your destination you can reserve your booking spot Fiber@Home Vehicle No: D-13456 Enable GPS
Set You can Book your selected parking area now You have to exit from current destination to change new parking spot. Do you want to change the parking spot? 00:00–00:00pm 00:00min Please wait… Are you sure you want to exit? Get Support 01924262749 Call Do you want to change the parking spot? Please try again Search… English Bangla Select Language GPS Disabled Gps is disabled, in order to use the application properly you need to enable GPS of your device Permission Denied permanently Allow Please allow this permission from settings Permission Denied permanently,Please allow location for all the time from settings In order to get all services from this app, Please allow location for all the time from settings Please allow All Time Location Please allow location for all the time from settings Background location permission allowed Foreground location permission allowed Start Foreground and Background Location Updates
Start foreground location updates, Please click allow all the time for using Parking App
Background location permission denied, Please click allow all the time for using Parking App Location Permission denied, Please click allow all the time for using Parking App Please search in bangla language for getting result. Install bangla enable keyboard & change app language into Bangla Bangla searching is not available right now, Please wait until next version is coming Change app language into english
Permission Denied,You can\'t search nearest parking location from you. For further use please allow location Enabling GPS Internet connection is too slow No data found Update New version available Please, update app to new version to continue using No, thanks Are you sure you want to exit? No routes exist Something went wrong!!! Please check your Internet connection Language settings Sorry, No parking spot found Please Enter Valid OTP… Verify OTP Verify your phone number Something went wrong please try again Are you sure you want to exit without giving permission? GPS is required for this app to work. Please enable GPS. Initializing location GPS not enabled. Unable to show user location
If you have not received any OTP code within 2.30 minutes then resend
